techmeme.title: Anthropic adds web search in preview for Claude 3.7 Sonnet, available now for paid US Claude users, with support for free users and more countries coming soon (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Source: Perplexity has discussed raising as much as $500M to $1B in a new round that would double its valuation to $18B; its current ARR is nearly $100M (Shirin Ghaffary/Bloomberg)
Threads rolls out new features: ability to set following feed or any custom feed as the default, limit post replies to followers, a better video player, more (Tom Warren/The Verge)
OpenAI adds gpt-4o-mini-tts, a text-to-speech model that it says delivers more nuanced and realistic-sounding speech, and two speech-to-text models to its API (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
LG shuts down Art Lab, its NFT marketplace for TVs launched in 2022 during the NFT craze; LG Art Lab used the Hedera network and expanded to Ethereum in 2024 (Emma Roth/The Verge)
